attributes.action: 50cc bikes being unrestricted for 16 year olds as 30 is dangerous
attributes.background: 30mph is to dangerous for a 16 year old to be riding on a rode with. Cars bully 16 year olds when riding in national speed limit areas such as  A roads through the countryside. This puts them in danger and makes them get them de restricted which is breaking the law

rejection.details:
We think you may be asking for restrictions on the use of 50cc motorbikes or mopeds by 16 year olds on public roads with a 30mph speed limit.

If you would like to redraft and resubmit your petition it will be reconsidered.
